summary: Dr. Scott C. Moran was charged with unprofessional conduct and professional incompetence after exhibiting erratic behavior, sending threatening messages to hospital employees, and being diagnosed with a medical condition affecting his ability to practice safely. The Maryland State Board of Physicians issued a Consent Order, reprimanding him and suspending his medical license for a minimum of one year. He is also required to enroll in and comply with the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program.
